page.title: 08THE PUBLIC HOUSE : HINXWORTH
page.content: THE THREE HORSESHOES - Life in the pub can be frustrating and hard work but never boring! For the pub to run smoothly we really need to keep to a routine but unfortunately living in the country doesn't go hand in hand with efficiency e.g. when some calves were delivered to a farmer one escaped and tried marathon running! What should have been a normal lunchtime with just a few business people and locals enjoying their ploughmans and a pint turned into a riot as the locals rushed out to help round up the offender. Even in the bad winter of 1981/82 when the village was tempor- arily cut off as snow drifted across the road people fought their way to the pub as if embarking on some great adventure. Everyone crosses our thres- hold at some time or other to eat or drink or even to beg or borrow.
